paper_abstract: A modified WTC algorithm for the Painleve test of nonlinear PDEs with variable coefficients is proposed. Compared to the Kruskal's simplification algorithm, the modified algorithm further simplifies the computation in the third step of the Painleve test for variable-coefficient PDEs to some extent. Two examples illustrate the proposed modified algorithm. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A modified WTC algorithm for the Painleve test of nonlinear variable-coefficient PDEs
